summary: A fix for SweetFX Shader Suite error ''failed to initialize renderer unknown error creating the renderer''.
descriptionHtml:
This is a fix for SweetFX Mod, that causes error ''failed to initialize renderer unknown error creating the renderer''.


Install:

Extract SweetFX Fix.rar
Delete dxgi.dll and dxgi.fx from your The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim directory folder.
Copy and paste dxgi.dll.bak and dxgi.fx.bak into your game directory folder.
Done!


Now everything works as it should be.
author: MadDragon66
